fields.summary: hive compilation on hadoop 23 is failing

fields.description:
It's fine without -Doffline=true option. But with offline option (ant -Doffline=true clean package), it's failing with error message like this.

{noformat}
ivy-retrieve:

[ivy:retrieve] :: loading settings :: file = /home/navis/apache/oss-hive/ivy/ivysettings.xml
[ivy:retrieve]

{noformat}

At first I thought it's my problem(ivy cache or something). But log above shows that ivy is searching for non-existing artifacts in hadoop-0.20.2, which seemed to be a bug.

comments.body: Am I the only one who cannot build hive with offline option?

Navis,
You are not alone. I am also the one :) I tested your patch, but still cant build with -Doffline=true. Attaching the log. There are few build related changes recently, that might have affected this. If you update your patch, I will try to get this in.
{code}

BUILD FAILED

{code}
serde and builtins also stated referencing hadoop-23 libraries. updated that.

@Navis and Ashutosh:
I think some of my patches are referencing hadoop-23 libraries. which might fail offline build. Sorry about that.
Which commands are you using to build/test against hadoop-23? I will double check for further patches.

Also, +1 for the submitted patch.

Thanks,
Zhenxiao
